org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.monitor

Interface Monitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignmentMonitor, GangliaResourceMonitor, QueueMuxMonitor

    public interface Monitor
    Version:
    $Revision$

    The Job Monitor interface.

    Author:
    woollard, bfoster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNode(ResourceNode node)
      Adds a new ResourceNode for this Monitor to manage (if node already exist, then should perform update)
      boolean assignLoad(ResourceNode node, int loadValue) 
      int getLoad(ResourceNode node)
      Gets the load on a resource node available to the resource manager.
      ResourceNode getNodeById(String nodeId)
      Gets the ResourceNode with the given nodeId.
      ResourceNode getNodeByURL(URL ipAddr)
      Returns the ResourceNode with the given ipAddr.
      List getNodes() 
      boolean reduceLoad(ResourceNode node, int loadValue)
      Reduces the load on a particular ResourceNode by the given loadValue.
      void removeNodeById(String nodeId)
      Remove ResourceNode from this Monitor

    • Method Detail

      • getLoad

        int getLoad(ResourceNode node)
     throws MonitorException
        Gets the load on a resource node available to the resource manager.
        Parameters:
        node - The ResourceNode to obtain the load for.
        Returns:
        An integer respresentation of the load on a ResourceNode.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If there is any error obtaining the load.

      • getNodes

        List getNodes()
       throws MonitorException
        Returns:
        A List of the ResourceNodes known to the resource manager.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If any error occurs getting the List of ResourceNodes.

      • getNodeById

        ResourceNode getNodeById(String nodeId)
                  throws MonitorException
        Gets the ResourceNode with the given nodeId.
        Returns:
        The ResourceNode for the corresponding nodeId.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If any error occurs.

      • getNodeByURL

        ResourceNode getNodeByURL(URL ipAddr)
                   throws MonitorException
        Returns the ResourceNode with the given ipAddr.
        Parameters:
        ipAddr - The URL of the ResourceNode to return.
        Returns:
        The ResourceNode with the given ipAddr.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If any error occurs.

      • reduceLoad

        boolean reduceLoad(ResourceNode node,
                   int loadValue)
            throws MonitorException
        Reduces the load on a particular ResourceNode by the given loadValue.
        Parameters:
        node - The ResourceNode to reduce the load on.
        loadValue - The amount of reduction.
        Returns:
        True if successfully reduced, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If any error occurs.

      • assignLoad

        boolean assignLoad(ResourceNode node,
                   int loadValue)
            throws MonitorException
        Parameters:
        node - The ResourceNode to assign load to.
        loadValue - The integer load to assign to the given ResourceNode.
        Returns:
        True if the Monitor was able to assign the load, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        MonitorException - If any error occurs assigning the load.

      • addNode

        void addNode(ResourceNode node)
      throws MonitorException
        Adds a new ResourceNode for this Monitor to manage (if node already exist, then should perform update)
        Parameters:
        node - The new ResourceNode to manage
        Throws:
        MonitorException

      • removeNodeById

        void removeNodeById(String nodeId)
             throws MonitorException
        Remove ResourceNode from this Monitor
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The id of the ResourceNode to remove
        Throws:
        MonitorException
